mapper.select: INSERT INTO inprog.users(authority_id, first_name, last_name, login, password, middle_name) VALUES (#{authority}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{login}, #{password}, #{middleName}) RETURNING user_id as id, first_name, last_name, middle_name, authority_id as authority, login, password
SELECT user_id as id, first_name, last_name, middle_name, authority_id as authority, login, password FROM inprog.users WHERE user_id = #{id}
SELECT user_id as id, first_name, last_name, middle_name, email, birth_date, authority_id as authority FROM inprog.users
mapper.update: update inprog.users set first_name = #{firstName}, second_name = #{secondName}, middle_name = #{middleName}, email = #{email}, birth_date = #{birthDate} where user_id = #{id}
